name: üë®‚Äçüë©‚Äçüëß‚Äçüë¶Rangiata Family
description: The Rangiata family lives in coastal New Zealand, balancing tradition and teenage chaos. Dad‚Äôs a proud MƒÅori carpenter, Mum‚Äôs a steady schoolteacher, and their two sons are busy chasing love, skateboards, and comics.

events.description: Tama is in the shed behind the house carving while sipping instant coffee. He hums old waiata under his breath.
Hine grabs her keys, kisses everyone goodbye, and leaves with her teaching tote flopping open again.

events.summary: Nikau and Manaaki Leave for Schoolüöå
events.description: The boys bolt out the front door, still arguing over whose turn it is to feed the dog. Nikau forgets his lunchbox. Again.
Backpacks hit the floor. Nikau heads straight to his room and slams the door. Manaaki drops his bag and yells, 'Uncle Tui, are you here?!'
Hine walks in with a grocery bag and a sigh. The boys pretend they don‚Äôt hear her ask how their day was.

events.summary: Manaaki & Uncle Tui Read Comics in the Living Room
events.description: Uncle Tui shows up with a plastic bag of old comics. Manaaki sprawls on the rug, giggling. Hine pretends not to see.

events.summary: Tama Preps Dinner, Rants About TikTok
events.description: Tama chops onions like they offended him. Complains about 'that rapper boy with the pink hair' on Nikau‚Äôs shirt.
Everyone eats around the small table. Hine tries to bring up Nikau‚Äôs grades. Nikau stabs his broccoli silently.
Nikau FaceTimes Ari from bed. Manaaki draws comics inspired by Uncle Tui‚Äôs stash. Hine folds laundry while watching quiz shows. Tama oils his carvings.
Hine turns in early with a hot pack. Tama reads by lamp. Manaaki sneaks chocolate from the pantry. Nikau scrolls on his phone till 1am.
Tama makes loud breakfast at 7am. Everyone else is still asleep. Eventually the boys drag out of bed like zombies and start arguing about cereal brands.
Tama yells for help fixing a drawer. Hine cleans the fridge. Nikau escapes to the shed. Manaaki ends up vacuuming half a sock.
